message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm afraid $850000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $860000. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still a bit hesitant to accept $860000, but I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $880000. This is my final offer, considering the product's value and rarity. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.

I appreciate your efforts in adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $870000. I hope this proposal helps us reach a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. I'm still not convinced that $870000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, but I need to be closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000. This is my final counteroffer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with a price of $880000. I hope this helps us reach a compromise.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to budge much more. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll sell the product to you for $885000. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $875000. I hope this helps us reach a conclusion.
